title: "Azure Previews ND H100 V5 Virtual Machines to Accelerate Generative AI"
excerpt: "Azure recently announced the preview of the ND H100 v5, virtual machines that integrate the latest Nvidia H100 Tensor Core GPUs and support Quantum-2 InfiniBand networking. According to Microsoft, the new option will offer AI developers improved performance and scaling across thousands of GPUs."
